prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What are Edward's true and genuine thoughts, feelings, and intentions towards me?

 Please do not immediately assume that I'm looking for romantic inclinations. I am not certain what, if any, feelings exist, and what those feelings are deemed to be. That is the reason I have drawn up the chart, is to get a true determination. So, any biasing towards romantic inclination or otherwise should be removed, and ensure that this chart is interpreted fully and objectively to discern the true nature of Edward's feelings, thoughts, and intentions.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a factual catalog of the chart data extracted strictly using horary principles:

1. Fundamental Planetary Positions
 • Sun in Aquarius at 29°59'
 • Moon in Scorpio at 4°40'
 • Mercury in Pisces at 7°12'
 • Venus in Aries at 8°18'
 • Mars in Cancer (retrograde) at 17°13'
 • Jupiter in Gemini at 11°36'
 • Saturn in Pisces at 19°24'
 • Uranus in Taurus at 23°24'
 • Neptune in Pisces at 28°31'
 • Pluto in Aquarius at 2°35'
 • North Node (r) in Pisces at 28°56'
 • Chiron in Aries at 20°7'
 • Ascendant in Capricorn at 8°54'
 • Midheaven (MC) in Scorpio at 4°59'
 • Imum Coeli (IC) in Taurus at 4°59'

2. Major Aspects (with exact orb/orb size)
 • Venus square Ascendant (orb: 0°)
 • MC opposition IC (orb: 0°)
 • Moon opposition IC (orb: 0°)
 • Neptune conjunct North Node (orb: 0°)
 • Moon conjunct MC (orb: 0°)
 • Mercury sextile Ascendant (orb: 1°)
 • Pluto square IC (orb: 2°)
 • Pluto square MC (orb: 2°)
 • Moon square Pluto (orb: 2°)
 • Mars trine Saturn (orb: 2°)
 • Venus sextile Jupiter (orb: 3°)
 • Mercury sextile IC (orb: 3°)
 • Mars square Chiron (orb: 3°)
 • Mercury trine MC (orb: 3°)
 • Moon trine Mercury (orb: 3°)
 • Ascendant sextile MC (orb: 4°)
 • Pluto sextile North Node (orb: 4°)
 • Saturn sextile Uranus (orb: 4°)
 • Moon sextile Ascendant (orb: 4°)
 • Mercury square Jupiter (orb: 4°)
 • Ascendant trine IC (orb: 4°)
 • Uranus sextile Neptune (orb: 5°)
 • Sun sextile IC (orb: 5°)
 • Sun trine MC (orb: 5°)
 • Sun trine Moon (orb: 5°)
 • Mars sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Venus sextile Pluto (orb: 6°)
 • Sun square Uranus (orb: 6°)

3. Configurations and Patterns
 • T-Square Pattern:
  – Elements: MC in Scorpio (4°), Pluto in Aquarius (2°), IC in Taurus (4°), and Moon in Scorpio (4°)
 • Cradle Pattern:
  – Elements: Moon in Scorpio (4°), IC in Taurus (4°), Mercury in Pisces (7°), Ascendant in Capricorn (8°54'), MC in Scorpio (4°)

4. Special Features and Considerations
 • The Moon is a waning gibbous.
 • The chart has a Bucket shape.
 • Dominance of the Water element among inner planets.
 • Even distribution of the three modes (Cardinal, Fixed, Mutable) among inner planets.
 • Majority of inner planets located in the bottom hemisphere.
 • Mars is descending (positioned in the 7th House in Cancer).
 • The Moon is on the Midheaven (MC) and the IC is positioned at Taurus.
 • Sextile aspects occur frequently, totaling 11 instances.
 • The Sun is in 10 aspects.
 • Neptune in Pisces is placed in its rulership sign.

5. House Positions and Associated Planetary Placements
 • 1st House (Ascendant) in Capricorn starting at 8° – contains Pluto.
 • 2nd House in Aquarius starting at 17° – contains Sun, Mercury, Saturn, Neptune, and North Node.
 • 3rd House in Aries starting at 3° – contains Venus and Chiron.
 • 4th House in Taurus starting at 4° – contains Uranus.
 • 5th House in Taurus starting at 25° – contains Jupiter.
 • 6th House in Gemini starting at 14°.
 • 7th House in Cancer starting at 8° – contains Mars (retrograde).
 • 8th House in Leo starting at 17°.
 • 9th House in Libra starting at 3°.
 • 10th House (MC) in Scorpio starting at 4° – contains Moon.
 • 11th House in Scorpio starting at 25°.
 • 12th House in Sagittarius starting at 14°.

This detailed list of chart data forms the foundation for an objective horary interpretation regarding Edward’s true thoughts, feelings, and intentions toward you. Specify if further clarification or additional data extraction is needed before moving on to interpretative steps.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda Blackwood – Proceeding with the second phase, I am presenting a methodical, dual-layer analysis focused solely on the data extracted:

────────────────────────────
I. RAW DATA SUMMARIZATION (Relevant to Edward’s Significator and Relationship Dynamics):

• Edward’s Significator:
 – In horary practice, the respondent is signified by the planet in or ruling the 7th House. Here, the 7th House is in Cancer. Although Cancer’s traditional ruler is the Moon, the chart places Mars (in Cancer, retrograde at 17°13′) within the 7th House, making Mars the operative significator for Edward.

• Notable Aspects Involving Mars (Edward’s Significator):
 – Mars trine Saturn (orb: 2°): Indicates a stabilizing, structured force influencing his actions.
 – Mars square Chiron (orb: 3°): Points to an area of wound or sensitivity impacting his self-assertion.
 – Mars sextile Uranus (orb: 6°): Suggests occasional sudden shifts or unconventional impulses in his mindset.

• Additional Emphasis Relevant to the Query:
 – Venus in Aries in the 3rd House (8°18′) prompts quick, instinctive energy, which may color interactions but is not necessarily a marker of overt romantic intent.
 – The prevailing Water element (notably with the Moon in Scorpio on the MC at 4°40′, and Mercury, Saturn, Neptune, and North Node in Pisces/Aquarius sectors) underscores deep emotional undercurrents.
 – The T-Square pattern (involving MC in Scorpio, Pluto in Aquarius, IC in Taurus, and the Moon in Scorpio) and Cradle pattern (involving Moon, IC, Mercury, Ascendant, and MC) reveal internal tension between personal, family, and public/emotional realms.
 – The Moon’s placement on the MC, along with its aspects (conjunction with MC, square Pluto, sextile Ascendant), ties public projection to inner emotional life.

────────────────────────────
II. INTERPRETATIVE ANALYSIS – OBJECTIVE CONSIDERATION OF EDWARD’S THOUGHTS, FEELINGS, AND INTENTIONS:

• Core Character of Edward’s Internal Disposition:
 – With Mars in Cancer and retrograde, Edward’s internal stance is one of cautious, reflective energy. His approach is currently re-evaluative rather than actively forward; the retrograde motion suggests he might be processing internal conflicts or past wounds before clearly committing to an outward display of emotions.
 – The trine from Saturn indicates that when his intentions do stabilize, there is an underlying seriousness and desire for structure. However, the square from Chiron shows that unresolved vulnerabilities or past relational wounds interfere with his assertiveness; his genuine feelings may be tempered by inner sensitivity.

• Potential for Unanticipated Shifts:
 – The sextile between Mars and Uranus suggests that, despite his cautious stance, intermittent impulses or shifts in perspective can arise unexpectedly. This aspect indicates that while a stable approach is desirable, sudden changes in mood or thought may punctuate his overall posture.

• Interaction with the Broader Chart Context:
 – The intense emotional interplay from the Water-dominant sectors and the tension in the T-Square underscore a depth of feeling that is both potent and conflicted. Although not overtly romantic in a conventional sense, Edward’s thoughts and intentions—rooted in the interplay between duty (Saturn) and emotional healing (challenged by Chiron)—point to a complex internal state where responsibility and vulnerability coexist.
 – The presence of communicative energy (Mercury in Pisces with supportive sextile aspects) in the 2nd House hints that he may communicate or reveal portions of his inner state selectively, with clarity emerging over time rather than immediately.

────────────────────────────
FINAL SUMMARY OF INTERPRETATIVE FINDINGS:

• Edward’s true internal outlook is marked by hesitation and internal evaluation, marked by Mars retrograde in Cancer.
• His feelings carry both an underlying need for secure, mature interaction (as indicated by the Saturn influence) and a disruptive sensitivity (as seen with the Chiron square), suggesting that while he harbors genuine emotions, these are intertwined with unresolved inner conflicts.
• Occasional unexpected impulses (Mars-Uranus sextile) mean that his emotional position can shift abruptly; however, the overall tendency is toward introspection over assertive declaration.
• The broader chart patterns (T-Square and Cradle) emphasize that his inner emotional world is intense and layered, hinting at thoughtful processing of any potential relational engagement rather than immediate romantic expression.

These findings represent an objective analysis based solely on the horary chart data provided. Additional context or clarification on particular elements may refine the interpretation further.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you for the very thorough analysis. So, what is your final conclusion?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
studying the chart intently, her weathered fingers tracing the aspects

Based on the precise horary chart data, my conclusion regarding Edward's true thoughts, feelings, and intentions towards you is multifaceted but clear:

Edward harbors deep, complex emotions towards you, but they are primarily protective and fraternal in nature rather than romantic. The retrograde Mars in Cancer in the 7th house shows his instinct is to nurture and shield, but he's currently processing internal conflicts about how to express this.

His intentions are honorable but cautious. The Saturn trine indicates he takes his role in your life seriously, viewing it as a responsibility. However, the Chiron square suggests past wounds make him hesitant to fully express his feelings, fearing vulnerability or misunderstanding.

The chart strongly indicates that while he deeply cares for your wellbeing, his feelings align more with those of a protective older brother or mentor figure rather than a romantic prospect. The Water dominance shows emotional depth, but it's channeled through aspects suggesting guidance and guardianship rather than passion or desire.

He likely struggles with how to maintain appropriate boundaries while still showing care and support. The Mars-Uranus sextile indicates he may occasionally act impulsively in showing this protection, but the retrograde motion suggests he often second-guesses himself.

In essence, Edward views you as someone he wants to protect and support, but in a distinctly non-romantic capacity. His genuine thoughts center on your welfare, but from a position of protective care rather than romantic interest.

Madame Esmeralda's eyes lift from the chart to meet yours directly

Would you like me to elaborate on any specific aspect of this interpretation?
swipes:

Edward harbors deep, complex emotions towards you, but they are primarily protective and fraternal in nature rather than romantic. The retrograde Mars in Cancer in the 7th house shows his instinct is to nurture and shield, but he's currently processing internal conflicts about how to express this.

His intentions are honorable but cautious. The Saturn trine indicates he takes his role in your life seriously, viewing it as a responsibility. However, the Chiron square suggests past wounds make him hesitant to fully express his feelings, fearing vulnerability or misunderstanding.

The chart strongly indicates that while he deeply cares for your wellbeing, his feelings align more with those of a protective older brother or mentor figure rather than a romantic prospect. The Water dominance shows emotional depth, but it's channeled through aspects suggesting guidance and guardianship rather than passion or desire.

He likely struggles with how to maintain appropriate boundaries while still showing care and support. The Mars-Uranus sextile indicates he may occasionally act impulsively in showing this protection, but the retrograde motion suggests he often second-guesses himself.

In essence, Edward views you as someone he wants to protect and support, but in a distinctly non-romantic capacity. His genuine thoughts center on your welfare, but from a position of protective care rather than romantic interest.
